summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeLanolips Watermelon 101 Ointment Multi-Balm is a little tube of magic. This all-natural lanolin balm can be used for extremely dry lips, skin patches, cuticles, elbows and more. With watermelon and vitamin E.
details: DetailsBenefitsIt's Lanolips juiciest balm yetThe World's Best Lip Balm - as voted by Reddit, Vogue & The Times.Lanolips took their iconic Original 101 Ointment and infused it with vitamin E & natural watermelon fruit extracts to create the ultimate natural hydratorUsing ultra-pure grade Aussie lanolin, Lano's cult-classic 101 Ointment offers a safer, more effective & 100% natural alternative to common petroleum-based balmsThis juicy balm penetrates & seals in moisture to nourish and repair extremely dry & chapped lips, skin patches, cuticles, elbows & moreMulti Award WinningHard-working & powerful multi-taskerHolds 200% of its weight in moistureFeaturesFemale-Owned Beauty BrandTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productCruelty-FreeCertified by Leaping BunnyVegetarianFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsFragrancesParabensPthalatesPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2577304How To UseWarm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously.For external use only.IngredientsLanolin*, aroma*, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, citrullus lanatus (watermelon) seed oil*, tocopherol (vit E)*, *naturally derived*/*d√©riv√© naturellement.
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously.For external use only.

reviews.headline: Holy grail status!
reviews.comments: I've tried so many lippies overnight, to help keep my lips hydrated, over the years. After trying Lanolips for the first time, I'm never using another brand! After the first use, I still had some left on when I woke up! It blew my mind. Lanolips multi-balm has a thick texture that goes on easily. It looks gorgeous on, and has a very nice shine. Overall very happy to have tried this brand! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lip balm flavor and the way it makes my lips feel!

reviews.headline: Must
reviews.comments: This is s super hydrating balm that works wonders on dry lips and skin. The texture is thick and nourishing, and a little goes a long way. It has a sweet watermelon scent that's light. Great for locking in moisture anytime.

reviews.headline: They better never discontinue this!
reviews.comments: This is amazing for dry lips, breastfeeding , so many things! The flavor is not too strong and is perfect!

reviews.headline: Lanolips Multi Balm
reviews.comments: This scent is perfect for Summer. My lips feel very hydrated after I applied this product. My lips look shiny.

reviews.headline: ‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: I love it! however, it will occasionally leave a white residue on my lips.

reviews.headline: The most summery multi-balm
reviews.comments: This is my favorite multi-balm flavor for summer. I love watermelon and it reminds me of the summer heat and picnics. I break this out and feel like I'm instantly on the beach.

reviews.headline: My fav Balmüôáüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú®
reviews.comments: Lanolips Watermelon 101 Balm is super juicy and cute üçâüíñ Leaves lips soft, glossy, and sooo hydrated. Smells like fresh watermelon, not too sweet! Perfect for dry spots too. A little goes a long way ‚Äî love it in my bag always üíÖ‚ú®

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Hands down the BEST lip balm I have ever used.  Very emollient without being sticky or greasy.  A little goes a long way and keeps lips hydrated throughout the day.  Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love love
reviews.comments: It is so easy to apply and you don't need alot very hydrating as well.

reviews.headline: Pretty Okay
reviews.comments: I def did not get watermelon from this, I couldn't smell much of anything. A little bit of a bummer bc that's the only reason I picked this one. It is super thick and you dont have to reapply it too often, which was a plus. It was a little pricey for the amount of product that you get. Would I buy this again? Probably not but it was worth a shot.

reviews.headline: Works great, but it makes lips white
reviews.comments: I love the lanolips lip oitments, they smell so good and work really well. The formula is thick and lasts long, but if you put a bit to much or rub your lips together a lot your lips turn white. I have 7 and they all do it. They're not expired because i just opened them. But over all its a pretty good product

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I had very chapped lips and the salesclerk recommended this product. It worked quickly and I no longer have chapped lips.

reviews.headline: Amazing scent and amazing hydration!
reviews.comments:
I cannot recommend this product enough. It works wonders on my dry lips. I love the watermelon scent for summer! 

These also make really good gifts. I've converted all my friends

reviews.headline: Bland.
reviews.comments: The lipgloss is thick and heavy like petroleum. Nearly imperceptible flavor. Not very moisturizing. More sticky than oily.

reviews.headline: Works amazing, HORRIBLE flavor
reviews.comments: Works great, I love lanolips formula. This however tastes really bad and only has a hint of watermelon. I tried the raspberry shortcake balm instead and it was much better. I think these older products weren't manufactured with strong flavoring, but any of the new ones (aka the dulce de leche, raspberry shortcake, and glazed donut) have a flavor so that you don't taste the sheep sebum.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: This product changed my life its so good. I would recommend to all.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I don't usually post reviews but I really have to brag on this. I got this out west for the first time and fell in love instantly. The dryness and sun out there is no joke but this little tube of magic helped with dry lips and sunburn on my face. Highly recommend but a little goes a LONG way.

reviews.headline: By far the best
reviews.comments: I carry lip balm 25/8 and since I discovered this brand last year I haven't used any other balm. I have the same tube since end of September 2023. Use as directed and a little goes a long way. Purchased during a sale so I fid not pay full price.

reviews.headline: Saved my lips
reviews.comments: After a bout of arctic weather that left my lips dry and chapped I started using this daily. It has helped to sooth my cracked lips. After only a few days my lips are back to normal and i have a new favorite lip balm. I will say it is a thick ointment type balm, so if that isn't a texture you like then this probably isn't for you. Also the watermelon scent is very faint and its only a scent, the product itself has no taste.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have had chronically dry lips for about a year now. I've tried every product I could possibly think of and was suggested to me and nothing worked. Out of desperation I asked an employee, and she suggested this. Oh my god. This product is amazing. In less than a week my lips have become more moisturized, and stayed moisturized, than this entire year. It is COMPLETELY worth the price if you have chronic dry lips like me!
faceoff_positive.headline: So far...AMAZING

faceoff_negative.comments: I love all of Lano's 101 Ointment Balms and plan to try them all. When this one came out, I ran to the nearest Ulta that had it. I'm so disappointed though. It performs like the 101 ointment balms, but there is barely any watermelon scent/flavor. The scent that is there too isn't the greatest. It's a bit like plastic watermelon. I hope Lano redoes the formula so people can really enjoy it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Where's The Watermelon?
